commitMessage:
feat: separate /plan command from /decide for cleaner architecture (HODGE-296)

## What Changed
- Created new `/plan` command for work planning and PM integration (src/commands/plan.ts, 412 lines)
- Simplified `/decide` command to focus solely on technical decisions (removed 140+ lines)
- Added comprehensive epic/story breakdown documentation (docs/epic-story-breakdown.md)
- Fixed GitHub adapter TypeScript strict mode compliance (510 lines refactored)
- Enhanced PM hooks with epic creation capabilities (+247 lines)
- Added new tests for PM integration (2 new test files)
- Updated Claude command documentation for both /decide and /plan

## Why This Change
The /decide command was overloaded with responsibilities, handling both technical
decision recording AND work planning/PM integration. This violated single responsibility
principle and made the codebase harder to maintain. Separating these concerns creates
a cleaner workflow: explore â†’ decide â†’ plan â†’ build.
